sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Dozens of Russian and Ukrainian prisoners of war have been exchanged in a deal facilitated by the United Arab Emirates, including captives from Bakhmut and Mariupol.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: France has announced the city of Marseille will receive the Olympic flame ahead of next year's Games, as more nations threaten to boycott if Russia competes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Apple reports its first quarterly decline in sales in four years as the impact of COVID restrictions on Chinese factories makes its mark.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: 63. That's the number of Russian soldiers Moscow says have returned from Ukraine on Saturday following a prisoner swap.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The troops included some special category detainees who were released after the United Arab Emirates helped facilitate the exchange.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: However, the Kremlin's defense ministry hasn't provided any details on these particular captives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the head of Ukraine's presidential office, Andriy Yermak, took to Telegram on Saturday to say that Moscow released 116 Ukrainian troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Some of these prisoners of war were captured in the eastern city of Bakhmut and from the devastated port city of Mariupol during Moscow's months-long siege surrounding the Azovstal steelworks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This comes amid fresh reports of civilian deaths in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: President Zelensky's officials say three people have been killed by Russian shelling and missile strikes over the past 24 hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The controversy over the alleged spy balloon continues.

sentences.sentence: The Pentagon says it has located a second Chinese-related balloon, this time over Latin America.

sentences.sentence: This, after Washington said it discovered an unusual object flying over the U.S. on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Secretary of State then canceled Sunday's high-stakes visit to Beijing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This was due to be the first high profile meeting between the two countries since China's President Xi Jinping met US President Joe Biden on the Indonesian island of Bali last November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Beijing denies any claims of spying and maintains the balloon is simply a weather monitoring airship that has blown off course.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But analysts warn the matter will further strain diplomatic relations between the two superpowers.

sentences.sentence: Ukraine is still considering boycotting the Paris Olympics next year if the international committee accepts Russian and Belarusian athletes under a neutral flag. sentences.sentence: The controversy has overshadowed the announcement that the Olympic Flame will start its journey in Marseille in April.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Grim times for big tech. Apple has just reported a 5% drop in sales for the final months of 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The company's first quarterly decline in almost four years reflects the impact of COVID restrictions in Chinese factories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It coincides with disappointing results for the same period for Google.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Parent company Alphabet's profit of $13.6 billion, or 12.4 billion euros, was below its earnings for the same period last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There was better news for Amazon, with its revenues exceeding expectations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But the online retail platform has already announced thousands of job cuts and has given a cautious sales forecast for the current quarter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Nearly a month since its supporters stormed Brazil's government buildings, former President Jair Bolsonaro re-emerged in Miami, speaking at a conservative conference at ex-U.S. President Donald Trump's hotel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He has spent several weeks in a Florida suburb since Brazil's new leader, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, took office.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At the summit, Bolsonaro expressed confusion over losing last October's election and did not directly address his supporters' uprising.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He is now under investigation back home for allegedly inciting the attack.
